cause.description:
ProgressNow Colorado has changed the political and ideological environment in Colorado. By supporting ProgressNow Colorado we can all help ensure that Colorado keeps moving foward!
1. A healthy democracy depends on the engagement of all citizens.
2. Progressive policies will ensure the health of our state and the success of all our citizens.
cause.mission: Promote a progressive agenda for Colorado, to counter right-wing misinformation, and to ensure a permannent progressive majority for our state.
cause.name: ProgressNow Colorado
